name: Namirudin!
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Happy birthday to my beloved lover! I hope we can always be together and support each other in each step ahead. May all your dreams come true and our love continues to grow deeper. I love you always! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to the love of my life!! Yeee!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Oke, sekarang kembali dan beritau jika kamu suka! Dan maaf kadonya menyusul yaa, belom nyampe :(
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
